Articles.Content: 1481:  The floor, walls, and ceiling is covered in a foot-thick layer of peanut butter.  Exit to the stairwell is on the opposite side.

6 hours ago, Xorth Tanovar said:

1481:  The floor, walls, and ceiling is covered in a foot-thick layer of peanut butter.  Exit to the stairwell is on the opposite side.

Yum
1482: The room is made of fractal; the walls, floor and ceiling are endless; so is the furniture; you feel dizzy and find it quite hard but make it to the end of the room.

11 hours ago, Firemetal said:

1482: The room is made of fractal; the walls, floor and ceiling are endless; so is the furniture; you feel dizzy and find it quite hard but make it to the end of the room.

What else need be said?

Edited December 7, 2016 by Xorth Tanovar

Floor 1843: You've finally reached the roof! You cry out in joy and laugh and laugh...then you see the walls and roof are cloaked. Hanging your head, you ascend ever upward.

Edited December 8, 2016 by TopHeavy11

Floor 1844: 

Wait, there's an elevator here! 

You look at the huge panel with floor buttons... There! One is marked TOP FLOOR. 

You slam the button, and the elevator shoots up like a rocket. Seconds later, however, there's a crunching sound, and a display in the elevator reads: WARNING: ELEVATOR OUT OF SERVICE. RETURNING TO STARTING FLOOR. 

You get out back at Floor 1844 and take the stairs to the next floor.

1485: you finally note the last two floors had incorrect numbers. Who's been painting over the signs?

Regardless, the door to this floor is locked, you continue upward....
1486: you walk through a busy marketplace in Renaissance Italy without noticing the shimmering grid of lines on the horizon.
1487: You find yourself in the middle of a Aircraft Carrier.

1488: You then find yourself on the field of the Army/Navy game.

Spoiler

GO NAVY!
1489: you find the army team having a victory party
1490: You find a sad sandwich.
Floor 1491: You find yourself pursued by terrifying burnt figures, scattered throughout the floor. Trying to avoid them, you stumble into the reactor room...

Floor 1492: After your ordeal on the previous floor, you see a green Earth-like planet get blown up by a small moon, and that small moon get blown up out of thin air...or vacuum...you decide to stop thinking and keep walking.
1493:  Gift shop. You spend waaay too much cash.
1494: You win back the money you spent via lottery.
1495: Just like most other lottery winners, you go bankrupt and join a gang of poor people.
1496: You meet an irate mixture of lunch foods and move on.
1497: You come across the "Ban the user above you!" thread.
1498: You get banned from the tower.
1499: A darkened room, containing the Golden Banhammer. Only those whose motives are pure may wield it.
1499.5: You decide that you are not worthy and sulk off to the next floor.
1500: Welcome to a new century! However,  The Danish army fails to conquer the peasants' republic of Dithmarschen.
1501: You find a Mass Relay.
1502: The wall is covered in pictures of a moon being mined out. Some parts vaguely remind you of something.
